_sText:
Hello,
thank you for checking the map and also enjoy after downloading.

it follows a short explenation about my map:
my idea was that it sucks do run all the way around to get from point A to B,so my simple system of getting shot from the main hall 
is inclueded in ba_jail_boostway.The T's are ought to group in the mass jail,a CT's enters a button and 3 secs later the T's will get boostet into another room,where they are cought and wait for the CT's,who got shot in another way.
The map includes every standard featuers like tunnels,a pool room,soccer room,weapon chamber,medic rooms,hidden weapons,teleporters a killmachine and so on.A secret was also added by me,what gives every player alive a full set of guns and nades-but dont be scared its hard to find and hard to activate ;).I hope you enjoy my map and thanks alot for your intrest.(video link below)

Jo leute,
